intro-header.en: Welcome to the Washtenaw County Prosecutor Dashboard

intro-body.en: A data dashboard and resource center to foster an accountable, transparent, and fair prosecutorial system in Washtenaw County.

county-body.en: WCPO pushed forth the transparency project and initiative.

poverty-solutions-body.en: University of Michigan Poverty Solutions center manages the project's design and development.

aclu-body.en: A key stakeholder in the transparency initiative and primary funding source for the project.
A key stakeholder in the transparency initiative and primary funding source for the project.

learn-body.en: Learn about the prosecutorial system and working with data.

analyze-body.en: Analyze data to evaluate the system and drive decision making.

engage-body.en: Connect with resources using data to impart change.

filing-decisions-body.en: Who's getting referred, diverted and processed?

habitual-offenders-body.en: Who's labeled as a habitual offender?

case-outcomes-body.en: Who recieves which type of case outcome?
